document_data.name: Townmaster's Hall
document_data.mainbody: The '''Townmaster's Hall''', later called the '''Town Council Hall''', was the local government building in [[Phandalin]].
document_data.Location: The town hall was located just south of the center of the village.
document_data.Structure: The hall was a single story building made of good quality stone and was well built. The roof was made of wood with a bell tower rising from the back.
document_data.Interior: The hall contained office space for the leader(s) of Phandalin as well as a small jail with two cells.
document_data.History:
When Phandalin was first resettled in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the Townmaster's Hall was the office of Townmaster [[Harbin Wester]], although he was known to also conduct official business from his personal home nearby. 

After only a few years, confidence in the Townmaster had plummeted, and the position was dissolved and replaced with a [[Town Council of Phandalin|Town Council]] consisting of Harbin Wester, [[Sildar Hallwinter]], and [[Halia Thornton]]. While their meeting place continued to be known as the Townmaster's Hall for some time,{{Cite adventurers league/In Volo's Wake|6}} it was eventually renamed to the "Town Council Hall." By the {{YearlinkName|1496}}, the town was undergoing a new political reorganization, and plans had been made to expand the hall to include a mayor's office.
